name: inferno-typescript-browserify-example
description: A TypeScript Inferno JSX example building with browserify/tsify

scripts.prebuild: mkdirp dist && rimraf dist/* && cpx src/**/*.{html,css,png} dist/
scripts.build: browserify --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV=production --PKG_NAME=$npm_package_name --PKG_VERSION=$npm_package_version ] -p [ tsify -p src ] src/index.tsx -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p [ common-shakeify -v ] | uglifyjs -c -m toplevel > dist/index.js
scripts.debug: budo --open --live --dir src/ src/index.tsx:index.js -- --extension=.tsx -t [ envify purge --NODE_ENV=development --PKG_NAME=$npm_package_name --PKG_VERSION=$npm_package_version ] -p [ tsify --sourceMap=true -p src ] --debug -v
